verses.verse: So all Israel<WH3478> were reckoned by genealogies;<WH3187> and behold,<WH3789> they are written in the book<WH5612> of the kings<WH4428> of Israel:<WH3478> and Judah<WH3063> was carried away<WH1540> captive to Babylon<WH894> for their disobedience.<WH4604>
Now the first<WH7223> inhabitants<WH3427> who lived in their possessions<WH272> in their cities<WH5892> were Israel,<WH3478> the priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and the Nethinim.<WH5411>
In Jerusalem<WH3389> lived<WH3427> of the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> and of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> and of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> and Manasseh:<WH4519>

Uthai<WH5793> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud,<WH5989> the son<WH1121> of Omri,<WH6018> the son<WH1121> of Imri,<WH566> the son<WH1121> of Bani,<WH1137> of the children<WH1121> of Perez<WH6557> the son<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
Of the Shilonites:<WH7888> Asaiah<WH6222> the firstborn,<WH1060> and his sons.<WH1121>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Zerah:<WH2226> Jeuel,<WH3262> and their brothers,<WH251> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> ninety.<WH8673>
Of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin:<WH1144> Sallu<WH5543> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Hodaviah,<WH1938> the son<WH1121> of Hassenuah,<WH5574>

and Ibneiah<WH2997> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> and Elah<WH425> the son<WH1121> of Uzzi,<WH5813> the son<WH1121> of Michri,<WH4381> and Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Shephatiah,<WH8203> the son<WH1121> of Reuel,<WH7467> the son<WH1121> of Ibnijah;<WH2998>

and their brothers,<WH251> according to their generations,<WH8435> nine<WH8672> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> - six.<WH8337> All these men<WH582> were heads<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' households by their fathers<WH1>' houses.<WH1004>
Of the priests:<WH3548> Jedaiah,<WH3048> and Jehoiarib,<WH3080> Jachin,<WH3199>

and Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah,<WH2518> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Zadok,<WH6659> the son<WH1121> of Meraioth,<WH4812> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub,<WH285> the ruler<WH5057> of the house<WH1004> of God;<WH430>

and Adaiah<WH5718> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Pashhur,<WH6583> the son<WH1121> of Malchijah,<WH4441> and Maasai<WH4640> the son<WH1121> of Adiel,<WH5717> the son<WH1121> of Jahzerah,<WH3170> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Meshillemith,<WH4921> the son<WH1121> of Immer;<WH564>

and their brothers,<WH251> heads<WH7218> of their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004> one thousand<WH505> seven<WH7651> hundred<WH3967> sixty;<WH8346> very able<WH2428> men<WH1368> for the work<WH4399> of the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
Of the Levites:<WH3881> Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Hasshub,<WH2815> the son<WH1121> of Azrikam,<WH5840> the son<WH1121> of Hashabiah,<WH2811> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari;<WH4847>
and Bakbakkar,<WH1230> Heresh,<WH2792> and Galal,<WH1559> and Mattaniah<WH4983> the son<WH1121> of Mica,<WH4316> the son<WH1121> of Zichri,<WH2147> the son<WH1121> of Asaph,<WH623>

and Obadiah<WH5662> the son<WH1121> of Shemaiah,<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Galal,<WH1559> the son<WH1121> of Jeduthun,<WH3038> and Berechiah<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Asa,<WH609> the son<WH1121> of Elkanah,<WH511> who lived<WH3427> in the villages<WH2691> of the Netophathites.<WH5200>
The porters:<WH7778> Shallum,<WH7967> and Akkub,<WH6126> and Talmon,<WH2929> and Ahiman,<WH289> and their brothers<WH251> (Shallum<WH7967> was the chief<WH7218>),
who previously served in the king<WH4428>'s gate<WH8179> eastward:<WH4217> they were the porters<WH7778> for the camp<WH4264> of the children<WH1121> of Levi.<WH3878>

Shallum<WH7967> the son<WH1121> of Kore,<WH6981> the son<WH1121> of Ebiasaph,<WH43> the son<WH1121> of Korah,<WH7141> and his brothers,<WH251> of his father<WH1>'s house,<WH1004> the Korahites,<WH7145> were over the work<WH4399> of the service,<WH5656> keepers<WH8104> of the thresholds<WH5592> of the tent:<WH168> and their fathers<WH1> had been over the camp<WH4264> of Yahweh,<WH3068> keepers<WH8104> of the entry.<WH3996>
Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> was ruler<WH5057> over them in time past,<WH6440> and Yahweh was with him.<WH3068>
Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Meshelemiah<WH4920> was porter<WH7778> of the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

All these who were chosen<WH1305> to be porters<WH7778> in the thresholds<WH5592> were two hundred<WH3967> and twelve.<WH8147> These were reckoned by genealogy<WH3187> in their villages,<WH2691> whom<WH1992> David<WH1732> and Samuel<WH8050> the seer<WH7200> ordained<WH3245> in their office of trust.<WH530>
So they and their children<WH1121> had the oversight of the gates<WH8179> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> even the house<WH1004> of the tent,<WH168> by wards.<WH4931>
On the four<WH702> sides<WH7307> were the porters,<WH7778> toward the east,<WH4217> west,<WH3220> north,<WH6828> and south.<WH5045>
Their brothers,<WH251> in their villages,<WH2691> were to come<WH935> in every seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> from time<WH6256> to time to be with them:<WH6256>

for the four<WH702> chief<WH1368> porters,<WH7778> who were Levites,<WH3881> were in an office<WH530> of trust,<WH3957> and were over the rooms and over the treasuries<WH214> in the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
They lodged<WH3885> around<WH5439> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> because that duty<WH4931> was on them;<WH4668> and to them pertained its opening morning by morning.<WH1242>
Certain of<WH5921> them were in charge of<WH5921> the vessels<WH3627> of<WH5921> service;<WH935> for by count were these brought in and by count were these taken out.<WH3318>

Some of them also were appointed<WH4487> over the furniture,<WH3627> and over all the vessels<WH3627> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> and over the fine flour,<WH5560> and the wine,<WH3196> and the oil,<WH8081> and the frankincense,<WH3828> and the spices.<WH1314>
Some of the sons<WH1121> of the priests<WH3548> prepared<WH7543> the confection<WH4842> of the spices.<WH1314>

Mattithiah,<WH4993> one of the Levites,<WH3881> who was the firstborn<WH1060> of Shallum<WH7967> the Korahite,<WH7145> had the office<WH530> of trust over the things that were baked<WH4639> in pans.<WH2281>
Some of their brothers,<WH251> of the sons<WH1121> of the Kohathites,<WH6956> were over the show bread,<WH3899> to prepare<WH3559> it every Sabbath.<WH7676>

These are the singers,<WH7891> heads<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' households of the Levites,<WH3881> who lived in the rooms<WH3957> and were free<WH6362> from other service;<WH4399> for they were employed in their work day<WH3119> and night.<WH3915>
These were heads<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' households of the Levites,<WH3881> throughout their generations,<WH8435> chief<WH7218> men:<WH3427> these lived at Jerusalem.<WH3389>
In Gibeon<WH1391> there lived<WH3427> the father<WH1> of Gibeon,<WH1391> Jeiel,<WH3273> whose wife<WH802>'s name<WH8034> was Maacah:<WH4601>
and his firstborn<WH1060> son<WH1121> Abdon,<WH5658> and Zur,<WH6698> and Kish,<WH7027> and Baal,<WH1168> and Ner,<WH5369> and Nadab,<WH5070>
and Gedor,<WH1446> and Ahio,<WH283> and Zechariah,<WH2148> and Mikloth.<WH4732>
Mikloth<WH4732> became the father<WH3205> of Shimeam.<WH8043> They also lived<WH3427> with their brothers<WH251> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> over against their brothers.<WH251>

Ner<WH5369> became the father<WH3205> of Kish;<WH7027> and Kish<WH7027> became the father<WH3205> of Saul;<WH7586> and Saul<WH7586> became the father<WH3205> of Jonathan,<WH3083> and Malchishua,<WH4444> and Abinadab,<WH41> and Eshbaal.<WH792>
The son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3083> was Merib Baal;<WH4807> and Merib Baal<WH4807> became the father<WH3205> of Micah.<WH4318>
The sons<WH1121> of Micah:<WH4318> Pithon,<WH6377> and Melech,<WH4429> and Tahrea,<WH8475> and Ahaz.

Ahaz<WH271> became the father<WH3205> of Jarah;<WH3294> and Jarah<WH3294> became the father<WH3205> of Alemeth,<WH5964> and Azmaveth,<WH5820> and Zimri;<WH2174> and Zimri<WH2174> became the father<WH3205> of Moza;<WH4162>
and Moza<WH4162> became the father<WH3205> of Binea;<WH1150> and Rephaiah<WH7509> his son,<WH1121> Eleasah<WH501> his son,<WH1121> Azel<WH682> his son.<WH1121>

Azel<WH682> had six<WH8337> sons,<WH1121> whose names<WH8034> are these:<WH5840> Azrikam, Bocheru,<WH1074> and Ishmael,<WH3458> and Sheariah,<WH8187> and Obadiah,<WH5662> and Hanan:<WH2605> these were the sons<WH1121> of Azel.<WH682>
